```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(dslabs)
data(brexit_polls)
head(brexit_polls)
```

```{r}
brexit_polls  %>% filter(month(startdate)==4)
```

```{r}
brexit_polls %>% filter(enddate >= round_date(ymd("2016-06-12"),week_start=7) & enddate <= round_date(ymd("2016-06-18"),week_start =1))
```

```{r}
weekdays(ymd(max(brexit_polls$enddate)))

max(brexit_polls$enddate)
brexit_polls$enddate
table(weekdays(brexit_polls$enddate))
```
